//J B  WS  ALUop  RA1   RA2   const     WA
  0	0  10  00000000000000000000000      00001 // x1 = sw_i
  0	0  00  00000000000000000000101	    00010 // x2 = 5
  0	0  00  00000000000000000000001	    00100 // x4 = 1
  0	0  00  00000000000000000000000	    00011 // x3 = 0
  0	1  00	 11001	00001	00000	00000010	00000 // if x1 != x0: PC = PC + 3
  1	0	 00	 00000	00000	00000	00000100	00000 // else PC = PC + 4
  0	0	 01	 00000	00011	00010	00000000	00011 // x3 = x3 + x2
  0	0	 01	 01000	00001	00100	00000000	00001 // x1 = x1 - x4
  1	0	 00	 00000	00000	00000	11111100	00000 // PC = PC - 
  1	0	 00	 00000	00011	00000	00000000	00000 // out_o = x3
